Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

When dealing with parents who are upset, the best course of action is to attempt to determine the cause for their concern; therefore, asking why this parent wants her child discharged may provide insight into the cause and a potential solution.

 

[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$CELL] [$IMG("/media/Images/shutterstock_1050311993.jpg";200,300)] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: PSYCOSOCIAL INTEGRITY 108
